person.persName: Christopher S. Counts (Carter County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer and salt merchant. Virginia native. Married to Mary Ann Bishop Counts. Father of Martha J. Counts, Margaret E. Counts, Mary J. Counts, Phillip M. Counts, Eva Counts, George W. Counts, Sarah A. Counts, William J. Counts. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860. Salt merchant in Carter County in 1863.
